original_text: And when he came to him, behold, he stood by his burnt offering, and the princes of Moab with him. And Balak said unto him, What hath the Lord spoken?
korean_text: 발람이 가서 본즉 발락이 번제물 곁에 섰고 모압 고관들이 함께 있더라 발락이 발람에게 이르되 여호와께서 무슨 말씀을 하시더냐

sentences.original_text: And when he came to him
behold, he stood by his burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 그는 그의 번제물 곁에 서 있었고

sentences.original_text: and the princes of Moab with him
